item.title: Turning into npcs
item.dc:creator: @vegies vegies
item.description:
@vegies wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 01:11:20 AM[/size][hr]Doesnt Work On Certain Serversâ€¦

Read full topic
